amendments.authority: O.S.B.// Cdr D.J. Benoit CFNES Cmdt

POs.po_name: Maintain KINGSTON Class Internal Communications System
POs.performance: Maintain KINGSTON Class internal communications system (ICS).
POs.condition_environment:
• any conditions at sea or alongside; and
  • day or night.
POs.standard:
• initializing the system, to include:
    • power up; and
    • carry out equipment functional check.
  • fault isolation to the LRU, to include:
    • mechanical sub-systems;
    • electronic sub-systems;
    • electrical sub-systems; and
    • repair and align.
  • verify system operation, to include:
    • report equipment status to supervisor; and
    • power down.

EOs.condition_given:
• access to the equipment;
  • specified references; and
  • minimum supervision.
EOs.condition_environment:
• any shipboard conditions at sea of alongside; and
  • day or night.
EOs.standard:
• describing characteristics, capabilities and limitations, to include:
  • main ICS, to include:
    • automatic telephones;
    • broadcast;
    • entertainment system;
    • alarm system; and
    • intercom.
  • stand alone systems, to include;
    • self-powered phones,
    • voice recorder,
    • safe to fire / check fire system, and
    • loud hailer.
EOs.training_aids: ICS; references; handouts; and PowerPoint presentation.
EOs.total_time_required: EO - 2 X 50 minute periods; and EC - 1 X 50 minute period ..
EOs.test_details: EO 001.01 to be tested with EC 001.01 and part of PC 001 IAW Annex K

EOs.condition_given:
• access to the equipment;
  • specified references; and
  • minimum supervision.
EOs.condition_environment:
• any shipboard conditions at sea of alongside; and
  • day or night.
EOs.standard:
• initializing the main ICS, to include:
    • automatic telephones;
    • broadcast;
    • entertainment system;
    • alarm system; and
    • intercom.
  • initializing stand-alone systems, to include:
    • self-powered phones;
    • voice recorder;
    • safe to fire / check fire system; and
    • loud hailer.
EOs.training_aids: ICS; references; handouts; and PowerPoint presentation.
EOs.test_details: EO 001.02 to be tested as part of PC 001 IAW Annex K.

EOs.eo_name: Rectify System faults On The Internal Communications System (ICS)
EOs.performance: Rectify system faults on the ICS.
EOs.condition_environment:
• any shipboard conditions at sea of alongside; and
  • day or night.
EOs.standard:
• rectifying main ICS, to include:
    • automatic telephones;
    • broadcast;
    • entertainment system;
    • alarm system; and
    • intercom.
  • rectifying stand-alone systems, to include:
    • self-powered phones;
    • voice recorder;
    • safe to fire / check fire system; and
    • loud hailer.
EOs.training_aids: ICS; references; handouts; and tools and test equipment.
EOs.remarks: all students to rectify system faults.
EOs.instructional_methods: lecture; demo; practical; and guided discussion.
EOs.total_time_required: EO - 7 X 50 minute periods; and PC - 8 X 50 minute periods.
EOs.test_details: EO 001.03 to be tested as part of PC 001 IAW Annex K; and PC 001 and debrief to be conducted with a 50 min time limit (corrective measures start at min 45).

POs.po_name: Maintain KINGSTON Class External Communications System
POs.performance: Maintain KINGSTON Class external communications system.
POs.condition_environment:
• day or night
  • any conditions at sea or alongside.
POs.standard:
• initializing the system, to include:
    • power up; and
    • carry out equipment functional check.
  • fault isolation to the LRU, to include:
    • mechanical sub-systems;
    • electronic sub-systems;
    • electrical sub-systems; and
    • repair and align.
  • verify system operation to include:
    • report equipment status to supervisor; and
    • power down.

EOs.condition_given:
• access to the equipment;
  • specified references; and
  • minimum supervision.
EOs.condition_environment:
• any shipboard conditions at sea of alongside; and
  • day or night.
EOs.standard:
• describing ECS subsystem characteristics, capabilities and limitations, to include:
    • HF Radio Communication Subsystem;
    • VHF Radio Communication Subsystem;
    • UHF Radio Communication Subsystem;
    • Radio Remote Control Subsystem (RRCS);
    • Communications Control and Monitoring Subsystem (CCMS);
    • Message Handling System (MHS);
    • Fleet Broadband (FBB);
    • MCOIN; and
    • Signal/Search Lights.
EOs.total_time_required: 6  50 minute periods; and EC - 1 X 50 minute period ..
EOs.test_details: EO 002.01 to be tested with EC 002.01 and part of PC 002 IAW Annex K

EOs.condition_given:
• access to the equipment;
  • specified references; and
  • minimum supervision.
EOs.condition_environment:
• any shipboard conditions at sea of alongside; and
  • day or night.
EOs.standard:
• powering up;
  • carrying out equipment functional checks;
  • verifying system operation;
  • reporting equipment status to supervisor;
  • powering down; and
  • initializing the following ECS subsystems, to include:
    • HF Radio Communication Subsystem;
    • VHF Radio Communication Subsystem;
    • UHF Radio Communication Subsystem;
    • Radio Remote Control Subsystem (RRCS);
    • Communications Control and Monitoring Subsystem (CCMS);
    • Message Handling System (MHS);
    • Fleet Broadband (FBB);
    • MCOIN; and
    • Signal/Search Lights.
EOs.test_details: EO 002.02 to be tested as part of PC 002.

teaching_points.teaching_point: 1. Review the functional description of the 9 sub-functions to include:
teaching_points.rationale: Reviewing the functional description helps in understanding the overall system.

teaching_points.teaching_point: 2. Explain for External Communications System, to include:
teaching_points.teaching_subpoints:
• a) power up;
  • b) carry out equipment functional checks;
  • c) verify system operation;
  • d) report equipment status to supervisor; and,
  • e) power down.
teaching_points.rationale: Explaining the steps ensures the trainee understands the process of initializing the system.

teaching_points.teaching_point: 3. Demonstrate for External Communications System, to include:
teaching_points.teaching_subpoints:
• a) power up;
  • b) carry out equipment functional checks;
  • c) verify system operation;
  • d) report equipment status to supervisor; and,
  • e) power down.
teaching_points.rationale: Demonstrating the process helps in applying the knowledge practically.

EOs.eo_name: Rectify System Faults in the External Communications System (ECS)
EOs.performance: Rectify system faults in the ECS.
EOs.condition_given:
• access to the equipment;
  • specified references; and
  • minimum supervision.
EOs.condition_environment:
• any shipboard conditions at sea of alongside; and
  • day or night.
EOs.standard:
• rectifying faults in the following subsystems, to include:
    • HF Radio Communication Subsystem;
    • VHF Radio Communication Subsystem;
    • UHF Radio Communication Subsystem;
    • Radio Remote Control Subsystem (RRCS);
    • Communications Control and Monitoring Subsystem (CCMS);
    • Message Handling System (MHS);
    • Fleet Broadband (FBB);
    • MCOIN; and
    • Signal/Search Lights.
EOs.training_aids: references; external communications equipment; handouts; and tools and test equipment.
EOs.instructional_methods: lecture; demo; scenario; and guided discussion.
EOs.total_time_required: EO - 7 X 50 minute periods. PC - 8 X 50 minute periods.
EOs.test_details: EO 002.03 to be tested as part of PC 002 IAW Annex K; and PC 002 and debrief to be conducted with a 50 min time limit (corrective measures start at min 45).

POs.condition_environment:

POs.standard:
• initialize the system, to include:

  • fault isolate to the LRU, to include:
    • mechanical sub-systems;
    • electronic sub-systems;

EOs.eo_name: Rectify System Faults In the Payloads
EOs.condition_given:
• relevant fault scenarios;
  • tools / test equipment and spares as applicable;
  • assistance;
  • references; and
  • supervision.
EOs.condition_environment:
• any shipboard conditions at sea of alongside; and
  • day or night.
EOs.standard:
• rectifying faults in the following components to include:
  • route survey;
  • mine Inspection; and
  • mechanical mine sweeping
EOs.instructional_methods: lecture; guided discussion; demo; and practice.
EOs.total_time_required: EO - 7 X 50 minute periods; and PC - 8 X 50 minute periods.
EOs.test_details: EO 005.03 to be tested as part of PC 005 IAW Annex K; and PC 005 and debrief to be conducted with a 50 minute time limit (corrective measures start at Minute 45).

POs.po_name: Conduct KINGSTON Class Technical Administration Procedures
POs.performance: Conduct KINGSTON Class technical administration procedures.
POs.condition_environment:
• day or night; and
  • any conditions at sea or alongside.
POs.standard:
• generating/completing maintenance administration;
  • initiating/tracking maintenance routines, to include:
    • PM routines; and
    • corrective maintenance history.
  • tracking critical spare inventory;
  • tracking Health monitoring.
  • conducting external support administration, to include:
    • completing messages (OPDEFs);
    • verifying understanding of ship/MOG/ISSC/contractor liaison; and
    • verifying understanding of maintenance responsibilities.

EOs.condition_environment:
• any shipboard conditions at sea of alongside; and
  • day or night.
EOs.standard:
• generating/completing Work Estimate Action Form (WEAF);
  • initiating/tracking Maintenance Routines, to include:
  • PM Routines; and
  • Corrective Maintenance history.
  • tracking critical spare inventory.
EOs.training_aids: handouts; power point presentations; Isherwood computer; and references.
EOs.remarks: all trainees should have hands on opportunity to navigate the Maintenance Administration System.
EOs.total_time_required: EO - 3 X 50 minute periods; and EC - 1 X 50 minute period.
EOs.test_details: EO 006.01 will be tested with EC 006.01 IAW Annex K.

EOs.condition_environment:
• any shipboard conditions at sea of alongside; and
  • day or night.
EOs.standard:
• completing messages (OPDEFs);
  • explaining ship/MOG/ISSC/contractor liaison; and
  • explaining maintenance responsibilities.
EOs.training_aids: handouts; power point presentations; and references.
EOs.total_time_required: EO - 4 X 50 minute periods; and EC - 2 X 50 minute period.
EOs.test_details: EO 006.02 to be tested with EC 006.02 IAW Annex K.
